body.name: Ergonomic Mesh Office Chair, High Back Computer Executive Desk Chair with Adjustable Headrest and 4D Arms, Slide Seat, Tilt Lock-Dark Grey
features: ⏩ERGONOMIC HOME OFFICE DESK CHAIR--Features adjustable headrests, 4D armrests, adjustable lumbar support and height, 4-position tilt lock, and sliding seat, are all included in one chair. COLAMY Top-end Series chairs will upgrade your comfort to a new level

⏩VENTILATED MESH OFFICE CHAIR--Adopting high-end breathable mesh fabric imported from Korea with great flexibility and durability, the high-back office chair perfectly fits the curve of your spine and protects the cervical and lumbar spine. In addition, the lumbar support also offers well support for your back

⏩PERFECT SITTING EXPERIENCE--COLAMY high-end office chair combines imported Korean fabric and high-density molding foam to provide robust support for the hips. Thickened and widened luxury seat cushions and 4D adjustable armrests will enhance the experience during long hours of work or intense gaming.

⏩SLIDING SEAT ADJUSTMENT--The seat sliding feature can offer better back support to users as it ensures that your back is correctly pressed against the back of your chair. They can also help to relieve pressure from the back of the knees, as you can spread your weight across the seat’s surface area

⏩HEAVY DUTY, CERTIFIED COMFORT--360-degree swivel, Aluminum alloy metal base, and smooth-rolling casters for great stability and mobility. BIFMA certification, more reliable and sturdy. Class 4 gas cylinder verified by SGS,maximum capacity up to 300 lbs

⏩3-YEARS WARRANTY,BUY WITH CONFIDENCE!--Complete customer satisfaction is our top priority! All the necessary hardware and tools are included with this mesh chair.Easy to install and ready to use in about 10-15 minutes. Should you have any questions about this product, please do not hesitate to contact us and we will spare no effort to assist you with any questions ! Click to Add Cart Now!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Multi-Functional Ergonomic Office Chair Features adjustable headrests, 4D armrests, adjustable lumbar support and height, 4-position tilt lock, and sliding seat, are all included in one chair. COLAMY Top-end Series chairs will upgrade your comfort to a new level

Height Headrest Adjustment The headrest can be adjusted up and down to support your neck no matter what position you are sitting in Lumbar Support Adjustment Adjustable lumbar support can perfectly fit your spine and significantly ease the fatigue and pain of your back Sliding Seat Adjustment A seat slider on an office chair is a lever which allows you to adjust the distance between your seat and the back Adjustable 4D Armrests Soft PU padded armrests help reduce pressure on forearms and elbows during long hours of use, enhance your home & office sitting experience

Tilt Tension Adjustment Rock back and forth between 90°-130°. The tilt tension knob controls the tension of reclining Tilt and Reclining Function The backrest tilts back up to 130° and can be locked at 3 different angles, perfect for working, reading, or relaxing Heavy Duty Metal Base BIFIMA certification,more reliable and sturdy, maximum capacity up to 300lbs Smooth Rolling Casters Smooth-rolling casters for great stability and mobility, stable enough to support any activity in your work

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid chair, wonderful customer support
reviews.reviewText: My chair arrived with a broken piece of the lumbar support that helped lock it in place. I reached out to Colamy's customer support requesting a replacement part, as I had the means to swap out the broken part with a new one. The support team was fantastic and offered to replace the entire chair, free of charge and with no need for a return, which was very generous of them.As for the chair itself, it is a very sold chair with a good design. The head support can easily be adjusted to the perfect position by resting your neck and head against it and using your neck muscles to coax it into the best position. The leg support is very nice and your can essentially get a very supportive, relaxing rest by leaning back and putting your feet up for a few minutes. My only complaint is that the seat is somewhat smaller than my old chair. Fits my butt well enough, but if you are a larger person or like to put a leg up, you may want to explore other options. That said, its an office chair designed for work at a desk and not for lounging, so I can't really knock the design.Assembly was simple and easy. They provide all necessary tools and include a few spare bolts in case you drop one down a vent while assembling. Overall, a good chair for the price from a company that seems to be supportive of its products and cares about good customer relations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love this chair!
reviews.reviewText: I'm 5'8, 220lbs, wide shoulders and most of the chairs I tried the armrests were too close to the chair and were not comfortable. This chair is nice and wide with adjustable armrests which work like a charm. The pad is really nice, I was very uncomfortable on mesh chair, my legs would get sore and numb, but this chair is great not to firm and not to cushy. Would recommend this chair. Good recline adjustments and great construction. What I would improve is the head rest it's a bit on the lose side, but no complains it works good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great chair…even better price!
reviews.reviewText: I work from my home office and at my desk 9-10 hours per day…5 days a week. I was in need of a sturdy, comfortable office chair and spent several days/weeks looking for the “right chair”. I ended up going with one that I found at a local furniture store…a large warehouse type furniture store. It was $300 and was more of a padded executive type chair…faux leather…looked like I should be drinking brandy and smoking a pipe or cigar in it. It was extremely comfy, but about 4 months of use, it started to fall apart. It was not meant to be used 5-6 days a week 8+ hours per day. I took it back and they actually gave me a full refund! Anyway, I was back on the hunt for a chair. I looked at all makes and models and ended up finding this chair. It didn’t have a ton of reviews, but the ones it did have were all 4.5-5 star ratings. I decided to purchase the chair and figured that I could always return it if it didn’t work out. The chair arrived several days before it was supposed too in a very sturdy box. The chair required assembly, but it literally took me 15 minutes to put it together. The one “tricky” part was attaching the seat base to the back of the chair. The directions state that you need to put the seat base cushion side down on an elevated surface and then bolt the back to it. I flipped the shipping box in its tall edge to do this…worked great! If you’re not handy, you may need someone to assist you with holding the seat back in place while you put the bolts in…but…don’t let that deter you. It’s actually pretty easy. The chair looks REALLY good. It looks way more expensive than it is. My wife has a $600 big name brand office chair and mine looks equally as nice from a quality standpoint and mine also more features/functions. I LOVE the foot rest…use it all of the time. The adjustable lumbar support is great too. I’m 6’1”…215 pounds with an athletic physique…and this chair fits my body perfectly. The adjustable arm rests are great too. I have had the chair for almost 3 weeks and so far I am extremely happy with this chair. I give it two big thumbs up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NOT a paid Review
reviews.reviewText: Was not paid or offered anything for this review; I don't review often but this chair rocks. First of all the quality is top notch, resembling chairs that cost over $500. The back rest is very comfortable, the lumbar support is ok, could use some padding. The seat bucket it self is heavy and super sturdy, the cushion itself is a little stiff but it hasn't broken in yet so not complaining. The chair base is one solid piece covered in metal, very solid. Wheels are fine, nothing to write home about, they roll fine on carpet and bare floor. Arm wrests have a metal supports, the actual arm rests are plastic and seem well constructed as well. Head rest is my only complain, doesn't come forward enough to provide actual support, but if you're sitting ergonomically you don't need a head rest.Overall I would say for the price the chair is 5 star, waaaaaay better than anything else you can buy at this price range
